import React, { useState } from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Container , Row, Col, Image, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Modal from '../Modal/Modal' import classes from './CategoryGrid.module.css'; import breakfeast from "../../assets/breakfeast.png"; import lunch from "../../assets/lunch.png"; import dinner from "../../assets/dinner.png"; import pizza from "../../assets/pizza.png"; import burger from "../../assets/burgger.png"; import menu from "../../assets/menu.png"; const CategoryGrid = () => { const values = [true, 'sm-down', 'md-down', 'lg-down', 'xl-down', 'xxl-down']; const [fullscreen, setFullscreen] = useState(true); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); function handleShow(breakpoint) { setFullscreen(breakpoint); setShow(true); } return (
{values.map((v, idx) => ( ))}
